DOC.brief_title: Outcome Study Highly-cross Linked Polyethylene vs. Standard Polyethylene Primary Posterior Stabilized ( PS ) Total Knee
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize study seek enroll patient undergo primary total knee arthroplasty . Preoperative evaluation include detailed history physical exam clinical data collection ( SF-36 , WOMAC , Knee Society Scores ) , complete description procedure , demonstration actual type implant tibial insert , outline study protocol inform consent . Intraoperatively , patient undergo total knee arthroplasty utilize standard operative procedure . Each patient receive Zimmer NexGen posterior-stabilized total knee arthroplasty . During procedure preoperative visit , patient randomize seal envelope receive either standard Zimmer UHMWPE tibial insert Zimmer highly cross-linked UHMWPE tibial insert . Both surgeon patient blind type implant use . variation surgical technique hospital management patient throughout course study . Postoperatively , patient see routine follow-up six week , 6 month , 1 year yearly thereafter . Radiographs obtain visit . Clinical data form complete visit . At conclusion study radiograph assess sign polyethylene wear , osteolysis component loosening . preoperative postoperative knee score calculate patient compare patient group standard statistical analysis .
